title: Marauder and Warden Skins
body:
Hey,
Just wondering when those skins are meant to be released, thinking about heading to the shops today and pick some RP up to buy them. Any help would be superb. They look so good...

replies.body:
I just looked up surrender@20, and nothing's really there about it.

This isn't really the place to post things like that. Yes, you're looking for help and support, but this board is more to deal with technical issues that players are having than what skins they should buy. That belongs on misc., I think.
